parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: RecordId
parameters.description: The ID of the DNS record. You can call the [DescribeDomainRecords](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/dns/api-alidns-2015-01-09-describedomainrecords?spm=a2c63.p38356.help-menu-search-29697.d_0) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.

parameters.name: Weight
parameters.description: The weight of the DNS record that you want to specify. Valid values: `1 to 100`.
